Seoyeon

CSR

Introduction

Seoyeon is a South Korean singer under A2Z Entertainment. She is a member of the girl group CSR.

In December 2023, Seoyeon was revealed to be a contestant on WeTV's survival show "Chuang Asia" alongside fellow CSR members Duna, Geumhee and Yeham.
